properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 7 at 4:20AM PST until January 8 at 5:36PM PST by NWS Seattle WA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Washington...

Newaukum River near Chehalis affecting Lewis County
Chehalis River near Grand Mound affecting Thurston County

South West Region

Another 1 to 2 inches of precipitation is forecast for the southern
Cascades and Willapa Hills until a cold front moves through the area
late this afternoon and this evening. Snow levels will be near
5000 feet ahead of the front. Precipation rates and snow levels will
lower behind the front.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Chehalis River near Grand Mound
* From 8 AM Tuesday until Wednesday afternoon.
* At  4:00 AM Tuesday the stage was 140.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 141.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage around 8 AM
Tuesday and crest near 141.6 feet around 4 PM Tuesday. The river
will fall below flood stage Wednesday morning.
* Impact...At 141.0 feet, the Chehalis River in Thurston County will
flood several roads in Independence Valley including James Road...
Independence Road and Moon road. Flood waters will also cover
nearby farm lands.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars...vans...or trucks through flooded areas...this is
the cause of most flood related deaths in Washington. Be alert for
rapid changes and monitor developments by listening to NOAA Weather
radio or other local media.
